attributes.action: vote frog's and frog like people out of the work place
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we find these people highly annoying and irratating. they are alos distracting us form out work and making it very difficulty to concentrate.

we call to vote them out of the work place and send them to an island where they will all be happy together!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
